dream: Every night I have dreams about my two childhood ex best friends who were friends with me until I get sick. I always am trying to talk to them and at some point they’re mad or they ditch me for someone else or they were having babies
interpretation:
Dreams about childhood friends often symbolize unresolved emotions or unfinished business from the past. Your dream may be reflecting feelings of nostalgia, longing, or even sadness for the loss of these friendships. The fact that you mention getting sick in the dreams could represent a correlation between the deterioration of the friendships and your own personal well-being.

The theme of trying to talk to your ex-best friends may imply a desire to reconnect or make amends, suggesting that you might still have unfinished feelings or unresolved conflicts related to these relationships. The moments when they appear mad or ditch you for someone else could reflect your fears of rejection or abandonment, which may stem from the experiences of losing their friendship when you got sick.

The mention of them having babies in the dreams could have various interpretations. It might symbolize the growth and change that has taken place in their lives since your falling-out. Alternatively, it could represent a sense of them moving on and starting new chapters without you, accentuating the feeling of being left behind.

Overall, this dream may indicate that you are processing unresolved emotions related to the loss of these friendships and the impact it had on your life. It could be beneficial to explore these feelings during your waking hours, perhaps seeking closure or finding ways to heal from the past.
title: "Lost Connections and New Beginnings: Revisiting Childhood Bonds in the Depths of Dreams"

dream: I am at dinner at my best friend's house woth his dad and my boyfriend. We find out that they are cannibals. We leave but then my boyfriend returns to the house and comes back out to tell me he is now a cannibal too.
interpretation:
Dreams are highly personal and can have many different interpretations based on an individual's unique experiences and emotions. However, I can offer you a possible interpretation for your dream:

This dream could reflect feelings of betrayal and distrust in your close relationships. Being at dinner with your best friend's dad and your boyfriend may represent the integration and blending of your social circles and personal life. However, discovering that they are cannibals in the dream may symbolize a fear of hidden, darker aspects within these individuals or within the relationships themselves.

Leaving the house in the dream may indicate a desire to distance yourself from this unsettling revelation. However, your boyfriend returning to the house and sharing that he is now a cannibal could suggest feelings of shock, disappointment, or perhaps even feeling responsible for his choices. This part of the dream may represent concerns about changes in your relationship or someone close to you embracing behaviors or attitudes that you find morally objectionable.

Consider analyzing the dynamics and trust within your relationships. Are there any concerns or issues that have been causing worry or discomfort? Reflecting on your emotional reactions during the dream and upon waking can provide you with further insights into the specific fears or concerns that may be influencing these dream symbols. Remember that dreams often serve as a way for your subconscious mind to process and make sense of various emotions and experiences in your life.
title: "Dinner Party Nightmare: A Twist of Cannibalistic Revelations"

dream:
Měl jsem sen že moje instruktorka z tábora byla moje učitelka na zeměpis
Byla přestávka na oběd v práci přišli jsme jeden chlap odcházel domů,já si stoupl do řady a všiml jsem si ji za mnou ona mě taky a říká no pane Polesný o tom že se známe snad nemusíme ani mluvit s úsměvem ve tváři ,konec
interpretation: Tento sen může naznačovat, že ve vašem životě existuje určitá spojitost nebo podobnost mezi vašimi zážitky a různými lidmi, které potkáváte. Možná zde existuje vzájemná známost nebo propojení s někým ve vašem okolí, jako je vaše instruktorka z tábora, která se objevuje jako vaše učitelka zeměpisu. Přítomnost této osoby ve snu by mohla naznačovat, že komunikace a vztahy s tímto člověkem jsou příjemné a založené na vzájemném porozumění. Tento sen může také signalizovat potřebu vyvážení mezi pracovním a osobním životem, což se odráží ve snaze najít čas na přestávku na oběd. Celkově vzato, sen naznačuje příjemné a harmonické interakce, které se odehrávají ve vašem životě.
title: Camp Instructor Turns Geography Teacher: A Dream Encounter

dream: I dreamed I wandered into a fancy dinner with a long table covered by a white cloth. A man and young woman sat at the end.  The man was dressed in fancy clothes and excitedly invited me to join them for dinner. But when I did he told me to sit on his lap. I did but he immediately grabbed my boobs. I squirmed but he enjoyed it. I was surprised nobody tried to do anything about it. Then he took me to his castle home through a dimensional portal. Everything was dark gray, with a few notes of red. The castle was under a permanent night sky, and gave off villain vibes. There I found out he was the prince of this castle. He told me to go shower in one room, and left. I followed him and found a huge outdoor shower under the castle with a million cameras and screens. I found out he liked to shower with a million cameras watching him. I asked why. He said he always wanted to see what goes on behind clothes doors, so he believed everyone should be able to see what goes on behind his. I thought he was crazy. A smokey hologram of his emaciated father the king kept emerging from the ground, trying to warn him about something, but he kept pushing it back down. A message kept trying to play on one of the million screens, but he kept ignoring it. I thought about going back through the portal.  Monsters started to appear. Finally the king's hologram emerged, warning us that monsters were invading the castle! The message on screen played, warning us that the castle was being taken, and to escape! We escaped back through the dimensional portal, that apparently he needed my powers to create. Once we were on the other side, I was a warrior who's destiny was to destroy a pearl that a dragon loved. The dragon was dark purple and fierce, only a little larger than me. He lived in the remote misty mountain peaks peppered by lush trees and gorgeous sunrise views. We found on an ancient mountain shrine, a circle paved with sacred stones. I was a lean but uniquely talented warrior with jet black hair down to my chin. Despite the fight, sad music played in the background. I finally wrested the pearl from the dragon, and was about to destroy it, but he tried to stop me. The pearl erupted in light, dousing us all in light and shadow, as my sword swung towards the final blow and the dragon closed in. The dream ended before I saw what happened.
interpretation:
This dream appears to be a complex and vivid combination of different symbols and scenarios. As a dream interpreter, I will provide you with a general analysis of the dream, keeping in mind that personal associations and emotions related to specific symbols may vary.

The dream starts with you stumbling upon a fancy dinner. This could symbolize a desire for luxury or a sense of social acceptance. The man and young woman at the table represent elements of authority or influence. However, the man's inappropriate behavior towards you suggests an abusive or manipulative dynamic. It may symbolize feeling taken advantage of or disrespected in a particular situation. The lack of intervention from others could indicate feelings of isolation or powerlessness.

The transition to the castle through a dimensional portal suggests a shift into a different reality or mindset. The dark and villainous atmosphere of the castle could represent hidden fears, suppressed emotions, or a sense of being trapped in a negative situation. The prince's desire for everyone to see what goes on behind clothes doors could symbolize exhibitionism or a need for control over others.

The emergence of the smoky hologram of the emaciated father and the warning message on the screens indicates unresolved issues or ignored warnings. This could suggest that there are important messages or insights being disregarded in waking life.

The appearance of monsters invading the castle signifies threats or challenges that you may be facing. The hologram's desperate warning and the message on screen emphasize the imminent danger and need to escape. This could symbolize the need to take action, face your fears, or leave a toxic environment.

After escaping back through the dimensional portal, you transform into a skilled warrior destined to destroy a pearl loved by a dragon. This could represent a personal struggle or spiritual journey where you have to confront powerful forces within yourself or overcome obstacles. The dragon may symbolize inner fears or desires that need to be acknowledged and challenged. The sad music playing in the background suggests a mix of emotions during this conflict.

The dream ends before revealing what happens after you retrieve the pearl but implies a climactic moment of light, shadow, and the impending sword strike. This suggests that there is a significant turning point or resolution approaching in your waking life, where you may need to make a difficult choice or confront the consequences of your actions.

Overall, this dream could indicate feelings of being taken advantage of, trapped in a negative situation, facing imminent dangers, and undergoing a transformative journey. It suggests a need for self-reflection, taking action, and addressing unresolved issues in order to find resolution and growth.
title: "The Enchanted Dinner, the Castle Portal, and the Battle of Shadows: A Warrior's Destiny"

dream: So from what I believe was the start of my dream, I left my home to go to a house party. When I arrived there, I began talking to two girls. Somehow, I joked about nobody wanting to get with me at the party. And then they said something like: "Look at you, of course nobody would want you." I responded with a flurry of extremely disrespectful insults, which one of them brushed off. The fatter of the two looked disgusted, and went upstairs. I followed her up there sneakily, and saw her shut off the power to the house. Then, smoke began rising and everybody left. When I got home, I told my mom that I was home early because the party got shut down. Then, when I walked in everything became weird. I saw a weird yellow creature crawling around, which I informed my mom about. After that, I saw dozens of these weird creatures, and red ones began appearing too. I told my mom, but she acted confused and said she didn't see anything. After, I saw a car pull in the driveway with it's back-right wheel covered in these creatures. What was even stranger was that a garbage truck pulled into my kitchen, which was weird because it couldn't fit and just noclipped through the wall. My mom also didn't see this. I then thought I was going crazy, making me grab my things and walk out of the house. I began walking, and I saw a group that I thought I was familiar with, a group of serial killers. It was late at night, and they were killing somebody with hachets. I walked past them, and then they began running after me so I ran. I started getting tired, and got to a certain point in the road and got a "speed boost," and my legs moved fast and weren't tired. Myself in my dream noticed this, and said it was where I always seemed to get one, although I don't know why now. I ran to the backyard of my house, where they continued to chase me. For a split-second, I saw a video-game style chat in my upper left corner. I was in third person now, but couldn't see myself. It said I had been hit in my clavicle for a number of damage, then my dream ended.
interpretation:
Dreams can be complex and have various interpretations depending on the individual's personal experiences and emotions. However, based on the details provided, this dream may suggest feelings of insecurity, rejection, and a sense of being misunderstood.

The dream begins with the protagonist joking about nobody wanting to be with them at the party. The response from the two girls, particularly their hurtful comments, may reflect the dreamer's fear of rejection and low self-esteem. This could indicate a desire for acceptance and validation from others.

The sudden shift in the dream where the power is shut off and smoke begins rising could represent a feeling of chaos and instability. The protagonist's mother being unable to see the strange occurrences may suggest a sense of isolation and not being understood by loved ones.

The appearance of weird creatures, both yellow and red, may symbolize the dreamer's fears and anxieties manifesting into something tangible. The dreamer's mother's inability to see them could signify a disconnect between the dreamer's experiences and the understanding of others.

The appearance of a garbage truck in the kitchen, along with the dreamer feeling like they are going crazy, may represent a sense of clutter, confusion, and overwhelm in their waking life. The feeling of being chased by a group of serial killers could symbolize a fear of being harmed or pursued by negative influences or emotions.

The "speed boost" and the discussion of a familiar spot where it always occurs could suggest the dreamer's innate ability to overcome obstacles and find resilience in challenging situations. However, the dream abruptly ends with the dreamer receiving a hit, potentially indicating unresolved issues or vulnerabilities that need attention.

Overall, this dream may be highlighting the dreamer's insecurities, fears of rejection, and feelings of being misunderstood. It may serve as a reflection of their emotional state and the need to address these underlying concerns in order to find a sense of stability and self-acceptance.
title: "House Party Nightmare: Disrespect, Creatures, and Serial Killers"

dream: I dreamt that I went to the grocery to buy food for a party I was having. The party has a big turnout, and I get so drunk that I essentially black out. At one point, I come to and I'm riding in a truck with my grandparents. A car is tailgating us, and I arm myself with my grandpa's gun, just in case. The car goes to pass us, side swipes us, and my grandpa drives off the road into a field, to avoid crashing. The car starts to charge at us aggressively, but my grandpa manages to avoid it. The dream switches, and I wake up in bed after my party, and a friend of mine is in bed with me. I wake her up, as I don't remember the night's events, and she asks if we had sex. I reply honestly that I do not know, due to blacking out. Everyone is still at my house, and I ask them about the night's events, but nobody can tell me anything. I still feel drunk, as I'm stumbling and having trouble remembering. At one point I see that somehow my piano has been broken, which upsets me, and my nice acoustic guitar is being chewed on by my dog. It switches again, and I'm back in the truck with my grandparents, and we pass through a town where everyone is frozen in place, save for a few people who yell at us in a language I don't recognize as we pass by.
interpretation:
This dream seems to reflect feelings of being out of control and unsure of the events that are happening around you. The grocery store and party represent a desire for connection and enjoyment with others. However, the excessive drinking and blacking out may reflect a lack of control or a fear of losing control in social situations.

Riding in the truck with your grandparents symbolizes a sense of safety and familiarity. The car tailgating you and your reaction of arming yourself with a gun suggests a fear of being attacked or taken advantage of in some way.

The car side-swiping your truck and your grandpa's evasive maneuvers depict a close call with danger and a sense of relief that you managed to avoid a potentially harmful situation.

Waking up in bed with a friend and not remembering the events of the night may symbolize a fear of engaging in activities that you may regret or not fully understand the consequences of. Feeling drunk and having difficulty remembering further emphasizes this sense of losing control.

The broken piano and chewed guitar represent a sense of personal loss or damage. These musical instruments may symbolize creativity or passion in your life, and their state reflects a feeling of something important being damaged or compromised.

Finally, passing through a town where everyone is frozen and encountering people yelling in an unfamiliar language suggests a feeling of isolation or disconnection from the people around you. The inability to understand their language may symbolize a difficulty in understanding or relating to others in your waking life.

Overall, this dream appears to highlight a fear of losing control, uncertainty about your actions and their consequences, and a sense of disconnection from others. It may be reflecting feelings of vulnerability and a need to reevaluate your choices and priorities in order to find a sense of stability and fulfillment.
title: "Party Turning Chaotic: Blackouts, Gun Wielding, and Mysterious Encounters"

dream: The dream started on an underwater military vessel. I was watching it play out but was not in the dream. It was not a submarine but an open multi level deck that was made to be covered with water. the lower decks were also filled with water by design. there was a female captain on the upper deck navigating the vessel. she was joined by another military man who did not like where they were headed. the captain was navigating the boat with some futuristic device on the floor of the deck that resembled shiny crystals in sand that was arranged in a pattern that determined the boats destination. when the man told her he did not like the destination she explained that she had her orders she must follow. he suggested they change course and because of some supernatural powers he had, she was forced to follow his suggestion against her will. they had a conversation about the consequences of her not following her orders and she told the made that he had made her his prisoner by forcing her to change course. suddenly the navigation pattern of the floor started to disappear and it went through the floor and onto the floor of the deck below. there on the lower deck i see a man with long straight light brown hair sitting in a chair. as the lower deck was also designed to be filled with water his hair was spread out around him swirling in the water. his appearance was very powerful and godlike.  the man on the upper deck then said, "it looks like my father is really here now." I then thought that the man in the chair must be zeus when a voice sounded in my head and it was the godlike man speaking. He said, "do not be disrespectful. you know there is only one God. You know who I am." Immediately my dream changed and I was now in the dream. I was in a lush green meadow next to a road that was also covered in the green smooth grass. I was on a bicycle with the same long light brown has as the god-like man. a car was following behind me very slowly then pulled beside me. I looked over and it was the god-like man driving the car. He spoke to me in a language i could not understand. I understood he wanted to go with me and i replied, "yert" which was a word in the unknown language.  i could see our words in a chat bubbles over our heads written in the unknown language. As I went to get into the car it turned into a motorcycle with long high handlebars. The motorcycle was gleaming and covered in chrome but there was no motor. As we moved along on the motorcycle it moved so smoothly almost like flying and the man kept speaking to me in the unknown language. He said phrases rhythmically and at the end of every phrase he said in English, "do not judge me" over and over again after every phrase. I noticed we were dressed in soft thin white pants and tunic top with light beige embroidery. the whole scene was very serene as the view zoomed out and i was watching us from above riding along the country side. then as the motorcycle came to the top of a small rolling hill there was a shooting pain that contorted my body. it was then i woke up screaming with a cramp in the calf of my leg.
interpretation:
This dream appears to contain several elements that may signify certain themes or emotions in your waking life.

The underwater military vessel may symbolize exploring the depths of your subconscious mind or deep emotions. The fact that it is not a submarine but an open deck suggests an openness or vulnerability in your approach to these emotions.

The female captain navigating with a futuristic device could represent your own strong and decisive leadership qualities. However, the military man who forces her to change course against her will may symbolize conflicting desires or external influences that challenge your ability to assert control over your own direction.

The appearance of the man with long hair on the lower deck could represent a powerful, godlike figure in your life or within yourself. His presence may indicate a need for guidance, wisdom, or the recognition of your own inner strength and divinity.

The conversation about there being only one God and the unknown language spoken may reflect a desire for spiritual or higher understanding. The man's repetition of "do not judge me" suggests the importance of acceptance and open-mindedness in your spiritual journey.

The shift to the lush green meadow and the calm, serene atmosphere may represent a sense of peace and contentment that comes from aligning with your spiritual path. The motorcycle without a motor may symbolize a smooth, effortless progression or movement forward, possibly indicating a harmonious integration of different aspects of your being.

The shooting pain and cramp in your leg upon waking could be a physical manifestation of the stress or tension you may be experiencing as you navigate these different aspects of yourself or explore new spiritual territory.

Overall, this dream suggests a journey of self-discovery, spiritual exploration, and the importance of finding balance and acceptance within yourself. It may be beneficial to reflect on these themes and consider how they relate to your waking life experiences and emotions.
title: "Underwater Vessel, Supernatural Powers, and the Godlike Encounter: A Dream Journey with Unexpected Consequences"

dream: I had a dream that I needed to go to a place but I had no transportation so what I was doing was I had a web kinda like Spider-Man but I couldn’t stick it to anything but a giant rock so I would throw the rock really far with my Web stick to it and then I would swing all the way over there and I would do it continuously until I got to a gas station where I was attacked and the gas station blew up
interpretation:
Dreams can carry a variety of symbolic meanings, and it's important to remember that dream interpretation is very personal. However, here is a possible interpretation for your dream:

The dream suggests that you are facing a situation or task that requires you to find your own unique way of reaching your goals. The inability to have traditional transportation implies that you may need to find unconventional methods or approaches to overcome obstacles in your waking life. The web-like ability is reminiscent of Spider-Man's agility and adaptability, highlighting your resourcefulness and creative problem-solving skills.

The giant rock to which you attach your web could represent a stable foundation or support system that helps you navigate through challenges. Continuously throwing yourself forward and swinging in the dream may signify your perseverance and determination to reach your destination.

However, upon arriving at the gas station, you are attacked and it subsequently explodes. This part of the dream suggests that there may be unexpected conflicts or challenges along your journey. It could indicate a fear of being harmed or hindered by external circumstances or even personal insecurities. Alternatively, the explosion might symbolize a sense of release or letting go, indicating that you need to address any volatile or explosive emotions within yourself.

Ultimately, this dream encourages you to trust in your ability to adapt and find creative solutions as you work towards your goals. It also reminds you to be prepared for unexpected challenges and conflicts that may arise along the way.
title: "Desperate Flight: Web-Swinging Towards Peril and Explosive Encounters"

dream: I had a dream that I was with my little sisters that I haven’t seen in a long time and we were at my ex best friend’s house and they pulled out a picture of her and I told them I could beat the shit out of her and they didn’t respond, but then we started smoking on their bed and we ended up going to a Playhouse with a bunch of plastic balls that we could play in
interpretation:
Dreams are complex and can have different interpretations based on an individual's personal experiences and emotions. However, I can offer a potential interpretation of the symbols in your dream.

The presence of your little sisters could symbolize a desire for connection, reunion, or the need for nurturing relationships. It suggests a longing to be close to your family members who you haven't seen in a long time. This could indicate unresolved emotions or a longing for past connections and shared experiences.

The setting of your ex-best friend's house represents a connection to your past. It may suggest unresolved issues or unfinished business with this person. The picture of your ex-best friend could signify unresolved emotions related to the friendship, such as feelings of anger, regret, or even a desire for confrontation.

Expressing a desire to "beat the shit out of her" may indicate anger, resentment, or unresolved conflict within you. It is important to acknowledge and address these feelings in order to find emotional closure.

Smoking on their bed could symbolize a need for comfort or relaxation in the midst of this tense situation. It may also suggest a desire to escape or find temporary relief from emotions or conflicts.

The Playhouse filled with plastic balls represents a sense of playfulness and childlike innocence. This could reflect a desire for freedom, joy, and a return to simpler times. It might suggest a longing to let go of the tension and engage in happier, carefree experiences.

Overall, this dream seems to indicate a mix of emotions, including a longing for familial connection, unresolved feelings towards your ex-best friend, and a desire for emotional release and happier experiences. It may be beneficial to reflect on these symbols and explore any underlying emotions or conflicts in your waking life that might be fueling these dream scenarios.
title: "Sisterly Reunion and Playtime Turns Unexpectedly Fiery at Ex-Best Friend's House"

dream: I had a dream I was riding a motorcycle, and I found an illegal facility that I wasn’t supposed to be in so they chased me away
interpretation:
Dreams involving motorcycles can symbolize a sense of freedom, excitement, and a desire for independence. Riding a motorcycle in your dream may suggest that you are embracing your own power and taking charge of your life. 

Finding an illegal facility in the dream represents stumbling upon something that may be hidden or forbidden in your waking life. This could signify that you have recently become aware of a secret or a situation that you should not be involved in or associated with. 

The fact that you were chased away from the illegal facility indicates that you have a sense of fear or guilt about being caught or getting involved in something outside the boundaries of what is considered acceptable. It may be a reflection of your conscience warning you to stay away from potential trouble or unethical situations.

Overall, this dream suggests that you are becoming aware of boundaries and the importance of staying on the right path. It may be reminding you to make wise decisions and avoid engaging in activities that could have negative consequences.
title: Rebellious Ride: Unveiling the Forbidden Facility
